post:
Due to the extreme success of our VPS plans over the past few months, we have added new plans, and features to further improve our plans!

The 75% for the first month special is still running, and will run for the next 2 weeks - so take advantage of it while it lasts!

On all plans above the VPS 128, we provide a billing system (ClientExec) free of charge, and provide WHMCS for an additional $5/month.

COUPON: VPS75OFFFIRST *
* Does not apply to Windows VPS plans.

Our new plans utilize the following MONSTER servers:

2 x Intel Xeon 5420 (8 x 2.5Ghz Cores, 24MB Cache)
32GB FB-DIMM DDR2 RAM
8+ Drives RAID 10
Dual Redundant Power Supplies
